Pre-Game Insights: India rested captain Rohit Sharma, leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal and all-rounder Hardik Pandya for their final Super 4 match against Afghanistan
Others: KL Rahul confirmed at the toss that Rohit Sharma wanted to take a break, considering the tough conditions in the UAE and the World Cup ahead. India also made as many as 3 changes for the dead rubber in Dubai after having been knocked out of the race to the final of the continental tournament.
